edu.buffalo.cse.ir.wikiindexer.wikipedia
Class WikipediaDocument

java.lang.Object
  edu.buffalo.cse.ir.wikiindexer.wikipedia.WikipediaDocument

public class WikipediaDocument
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
nikhillo This class acts as a container for a single wikipedia page. It has a structure analogous to how a page looks in a browser The class has various getters and setters for the different fields You would call the setters from within your parser code to populate the fields as you parse them. The getters would be used by your indexer(s) as and when you implement them
